import Mathlib

open Set

variable {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]

def zero_set (f : X → ℝ) : Set X := {x | f x = 0}

theorem Rudin_exercise_4_3 {f : X → ℝ} (hf : Continuous f) : IsClosed (zero_set f) := by sorry
